lender.name: marilou
lender.loan_because: i want to help build the community for better life, prevent poverty and develop faith in God of Israel
lender.occupational_info: i wish to to help the community live in accordance with God´s will, one mind, one body, one faith, one spirit, one baptism, one Lord

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: These people in need are asking for our help

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think entrepreneurs around the world deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Full time college student and entrepreneur.

lender.name: Jennifer & Jacob
lender.loan_because: We feel it is right to help out those who are less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: Jennifer helps people understand their medications and take them correctly. Jacob manages a large restaurant that seats almost 600 people.

lender.name: Déo
lender.loan_because: Help people through the world is amazing.

lender.name: Ty,Glen,von,gil,sam,tobi
lender.loan_because: because we have been self employed most of our married life. We know how tough it can be, but for us as a family it has always been the good choice. There is a freedom with owning your own business...
lender.occupational_info: Plumber... I wish I could said we installed flushing toilets, and running water, but we want so much more than that in houses in North america. gardening: my favorite. pull weeds, cut the grass, and harvest the herbs, salad greens, veggies and more. playing guitar: a few of my kids play their guitars, and sing at farmers markets. They really enjoy the sound of music and how it brightens everyones day.

lender.name: Micki
lender.loan_because: It's important to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Have an online school with low cost courses that run 6 times a year.

lender.name: Umoja
lender.loan_because: The spirit in all people must be recognized.
lender.occupational_info: I process (decontaminate, package/prepare, and sterilize) instruments used in sterile, surgical procedures.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: it's an easy, effective way to make a difference. What a great way to support people who need it. Best of all, the loans are interest free, which means that people on both sides don't lose anything and gain a whole lot more. Kiva is such a beautiful idea

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: This is the forefront of of economic evolution!
lender.occupational_info: i help manufacture electronic devices that bridge the gap between technology and life

lender.name: John & Carolyn
lender.loan_because: My wife and I want to help people make a living.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are retired but donate our time for worthy causes.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupation: President of a Gardner Green Energy
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am the President of a Geo- Thermal Power Company

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's the Christian thing to do. I don't go to church often, but I've been thinking how we as individuals can help someone in a developing nation succeed. We're pretty spoiled here in Canada and we have so much to be thankful for: a stable government, a decent economy and a multi-cultural society that would make anyone proud to be a part of. I'm also thankful that GOD has given me a talent to draw and produce art.
lender.occupational_info: I do web graphics, website design and broadcast graphics, plus print graphics when needed.

lender.name: Mark and Erica
lender.loan_because: it is our birthday present to each other.
lender.occupational_info: Mark works in Marketing for Peugeot, a French car manufacturer and Erica is a Remedial Massage Therapist with her own business

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to support hard-working people who've probably had less opportunity than me. And I think its really cool to be connected like this to someone on the other side of the world!
lender.occupational_info: I work for charitable organizations, either by supporting their volunteers or by helping them share what they do with the world.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: We want to empower people to overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We building housing for homeless people.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: EXHALE
lender.loan_because: As entrepreneurs ourselves we understand the challenges of starting up and growing businesses. Building your own businesses not only increases your income and standard of living but your sense of self worth and purpose. We hope to help others achieve their own dreams.
lender.occupational_info: EXHALE designs and builds luxury tropical villas in South East Asia.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I wish to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computer to order products, pay bills and make sure things are kept in order.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: We can do no great things, only small things with great love. ~ Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: I write about how my family is trying to live a simpler, greener life.

lender.name: Deda
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Seems like a cool way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of sitting and typing on my computer.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people that want to help themselves.....There are no hand outs here......

lender.name: Mitsuko
lender.loan_because: l want to be a part of someone's dream and life. l like Kiva's idea, because we can do an actual help to the people who want to take an action. Let's stay together in the positive circle.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a dancer more than 10 years. Now l'm teaching Gyrotonic and giving a Thai Yoga Massage in NYC. And also l just started to work for a Japanese music web magazine as an editor/translator. I'd like to share my experience and exchange good vibrations with others!

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: “Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.” John D.Rockefeller
lender.occupational_info: creating needs and meeting those needs

lender.name: Aideen
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together and helping others brings me joy.
lender.occupational_info: I have always helped and sometimes taught people of all ages, genders, ethnicities, disabilities, religions, and/or unfortunate circumstances to overcome blocks in their life's road.

lender.name: Elizabeth Newmarket NH
lender.loan_because: I want to help others work their way out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: As a retiree I am involved in working in a program for people who are homeless and on the board of a community health center. As an occupational therapist, I know that doing things that help people achieve their goals are very important for health and well-being.

lender.name: Peerlo
lender.loan_because: We are in a position to do so & therefore we should.
lender.occupational_info: We are a recruiting services company that source and supply professional people to world class companies

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is the best way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Kerstin
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have x chances !

lender.name: Lode
lender.loan_because: It feels great helping hard working people.

lender.name: The Robins Family
lender.loan_because: We sleep better at night knowing that a very small amount has made a very big difference to individual(s) that were never afforded the opportunities we have been given.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am a Soroptimist and the mission of Soroptimist is to improve the lives of women and girls.
lender.occupational_info: I just completed my bachelor's in public relations and am currently working for Meals-on-Wheels Greater San Diego as Community Outreach Manager.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to live in a great country like Australia, and I want to pass on some of my good fortune to those who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful program and I am grateful for the opportunity to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I work on movies.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I like to see where my money goes to do good.
lender.occupational_info: I make commercials for TV, magazines, radio and the web

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: Few things give this kind of joy. I'm a selfish person. I love to feel joyful.

lender.name: Holly
lender.occupational_info: I help make computer animated films.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: it is important to be provide direct and immediate financiall help to people so they can achieve their small business goals
lender.occupational_info: My role typically involves analyzing business problems and creating solutions to those problems. This can involve process improvement, software implementation and software redesign.

lender.name: Eowyn
lender.loan_because: doing so feels like a small step towards making the world a better place, a usually overwhelming thought. And the stories are great. I hope to be able to loan many more times.
lender.occupational_info: I am in training as a holistic health coach and massage therapist. My current job is to manage a small sales and distribution company in Europe for children's music boxes.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: a small act on my behalf has a large impact on the lives of others with this program. We are one people, and must help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze the loan requests of non profits and cities for essential community facilities in rural areas

lender.name: Emmelkamp Family
lender.loan_because: The Emmelkamps stand for Truth, Virtue, Gratitude, and Humility. We love and uplift everyone. We enjoy working and having lots of fun together. (Our family mission statement)
lender.occupational_info: Raising 6 kids

lender.name: olivia and dominic
lender.loan_because: It helps us feel connected to the world and we want to help the world be a better place.

lender.name: Charlie and Katie
lender.loan_because:
3 Reasons why we loan:
1. We want to help. We know that what we have to offer is not much but our hope is that our decision to commit financial support to someone in need will encourage others to do the same.
2. We hate the Paris Hilton/Hollywood/money is life kind of mentality. We think Kiva represents the exact opposite of that mentality.
3. Its really cool.
lender.occupational_info:
I, Charlie, am currently an unemployed attorney looking for work.
Katie is a sign language interpreter for the deaf and hard of hearing. She interprets doctor's office visits, business meetings, telephone conversations and other things so that deaf people can communicate effectively with hearing people.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I love Peru. I also like to see woman do well.
lender.occupational_info: I give Prenatal Care.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: ...life isn't fair and it truly is better to give than receive.

lender.name: Steven and Shannon
lender.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving...
lender.occupational_info: We are serving as Peace Corps Volunteers in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, West Indies. We teach life skills to secondary school drop-outs, remedial reading, and help with the development of community groups.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Beyond the fear is freedom.

lender.name: Corina
lender.loan_because: I care. When we all realize the oneness of everything we'll all HAVE to do something. This is something.

lender.name: Chad & Cathy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturer of industrial products. I work with our distributors to train and sell.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to participate positively in the world
lender.occupational_info: Helping organizations manage their Internet presence.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand the Internet as a tool to promote themselves and their businesses.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: I want to help real people in a personal and meaningful way which Kiva allows me to do.
lender.occupational_info: Testing new medicines

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: although I can't change the world, I can change the life of one person at a time. This is a small world after all.
lender.occupational_info: I serve my country in the silent ranks of the United State Marine Corps.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I love the direct way Kiva benefits those in need. Reading the hopes and plans of each Recipient, and being part of realizing them, is an important element of my life.
lender.occupational_info: My recorded voice is used for training, commercials, humor and more.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do! And it makes so much sense.... One person helping another directly. Even though we live worlds apart, we all share similar desires, challenges and opportunities. If I can help in this small way, it only makes sense. Peace!
lender.occupational_info: I own a shoe store in the Chicago area. We sell Birkenstock footwear and I love what I do. I realize how lucky I am, and I give thanks for my blessings every day!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I care about people
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at the University of Nebraska Lincoln

lender.name: Gulf Coast Council RPCVs
lender.loan_because: We understand the value of availability of capital in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of returned Peace Corps volunteers in the Houston-Galveston Area of Texas. We promote Peace Corps and raise money for Peace Corps projects around the world.

lender.name: betsy
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to share ones blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a vehicle/passenger ferry.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and we are called help others.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because:
I believe that we should help one another. We are so fortunate here in the U.S. and we need to help those who need a hand up. It is like a ripple effect; it goes out from YOU to the next person, then THEY pass it on.
We ARE ALL ONE people....
PASS IT ON...
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make a difference in the world by supporting the small farmers and to educate everyone about the impact they have on the environment and each other. I also promote peace and acceptance of all cultures, because we are all ONE PEOPLE of this Earth.

lender.name: Christina
lender.occupational_info: eating frozen treats, learning about the Revolution but trying to figure out how to be more effective than that

lender.name: j.b
lender.loan_because: I want to support individual grass roots initiative not institutional programming.

lender.name: Felicia
lender.occupation: high school English teacher for immigrant students

lender.name: Jennifer Donahue
lender.loan_because: "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other" -Mother Theresa

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have always been fortunate enough to receive help me when I needed it.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I have the fortune of living in a developed country and I feel a responsibility to help others who work very hard yet don't have the same opportunities.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much. If I can help make a difference by letting someone make use of what I have - it blesses me so much more!

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about eradicating poverty on our planet and empowering people to create change.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to use finance and property to become financially independant.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to give others the opportunities I have been afforded.

lender.name: Zafar
lender.loan_because: It is a duty of every person in the world to help somebody!

lender.name: Riaz Naseer Rao
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference if I can!
lender.occupational_info: Working to improve reliability of computer chips

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a doctor.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: Tikkun Olam -- healing the world.

lender.name: Judd
lender.loan_because: I want to help out people who don't have much money.
lender.occupational_info: My work is school.

lender.name: yamada
lender.loan_because: The water of one drop will become a large river before long. The self-performed action has only only power of one drop. However, it is believed that a global activity of KIVA leads us to the achievement of the large river without fail. It doesn't give it up even if there will be a target for which we hope in the far future. Because our behavior is connected with people all over the world. And because it is the one by not the interest but a human will the connection. The action is worthy of us. It has the boast there.
lender.occupational_info: I keep working though I retired once. The body is still put on the environment of the interest for life though the retirement age is passed, and it stepped forward to the second life. It will have hope very much when the life of the environment for which oneself hopes has extended hugely still in the future though it is sad. Anyway, the god doesn't desert the end no matter it is what.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: it directly helps the people - no overhead, no checkbook charity. Real funding, real people.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Architecture student at the University of Toronto in Toronto, Canada

lender.name: Acquire Hope
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed in life and sometimes all that is needed is a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: The Acquire Hope Foundation is about acquiring hope for those that seek empowerment and their full potential. Everyone deserves a chance to be all they can be.

lender.name: Ami
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. It is a way to feel like I am making a difference in the life of someone and help ease their struggle. I am a fan of the micro-loan, it seems the right way to get help out to the folks that really need it.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help support entrepreneurs building their dreams and livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: Our company designs and builds television stations and systems.

lender.name: Bernd
lender.occupational_info: Creating brands, graphic design and art.

lender.name: Jakob
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: i'm looking for a job in the marketing/media branch.

lender.name: Mick
lender.loan_because: There is no greater gift I can receive than to help someone and watch them suceed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people choose good and healthy foods to eat. I teach them the earth provides us with the foods and medicines we need and that not all foods are good for our bodies.

lender.name: Gary & Jolijn
lender.loan_because: We have travelled to many places all around the world and seen exactly how our money can be used to help people build a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: we will contribute to support people who want to be on her own.
lender.occupational_info: martin is designing and constructing pharmaceutical processes and factories; my wife is an insurance and investment expert

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: My sister was thoughtful enough to give me a gift certificate to Kiva, I already donate to various organizations such as Children international and Heifer, this is a perfect fit for me.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching World and European History I try to get my students to think about others in the world and that the world is shrinking we are all connected.

lender.name: Venkat
lender.loan_because: The biggest problem in the developing world is the lack of opportunities. And I believe that micro-finance is an excellent tool for creating these opportunities. I became a member of Kiva because I believe in "union gives strength".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Transportation Engineer and I help in designing traffic systems for safe and efficient movement of people and goods.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I feel honored to be a part of helping someone put an idea that will help themselves and their country into practice.
lender.occupational_info: I look at political and legal situations in foreign countries for investors interested in investing abroad.

lender.name: Annelie
lender.loan_because: It ´s a good idea to help people in the world.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way of helping others to help themselves.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It is great to give someone a fresh start in life and become self sufficient. We have our own small business in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: Fine art and graphic art relating to print media.

lender.name: Janel
lender.loan_because: people everywhere are in need.

lender.name: Jennifer James
lender.loan_because: helping others is a way of life. Where would the world be if we didn't spread a little love by doing good?
lender.occupational_info: Mom blogger, web director, freelance writer

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: it's the best way to help people without enabling/ perpetuating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying business and engineering.

lender.name: Rob and Patricia
lender.loan_because: Ms. Dibble is involved and sent us an email invitation. We consider ourselves blessed and wanted to share.

lender.name: Andreas Hobi
lender.loan_because: I love this idea and I am quite sure this is the best way to help these people.
lender.occupational_info: Working with Switzerland’s biggest travel and transport company (rail.ch).

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to help empower people to help themselves.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Maria & Ian
lender.loan_because: We need to raise the standard of living around the planet and empower small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children about ecology, the interdependencies of all life and how the actions they choose impact others and the planet.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: people deserve an opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It is clear that hard working people in various parts of the globe benefit enormously from these loans. In this small way, I can make a big difference.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: If nothing we do matters, then all that matters is what we do. Because, if there is no bigger meaning, then the smallest act of kindness is the greatest thing in the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because:
I think microfinance is a great tool to empower the citizens of the world.
I was a Kiva Fellow in Peru in 2008 and had an incredible experience learning about and from the women microentrepreneurs of Manuela Ramos. Check out my personal blog from Peru below.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for TransFair USA, the Fair Trade organization in the United States. Fair Trade Certification empowers farmers and farm workers to lift themselves out of poverty by investing in their farms and communities, protecting the environment, and developing the business skills necessary to compete in the global marketplace.

lender.name: Lindi
lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts. Putting someone's destiny in their own hands is a great gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a wide range of disciplines to effectively execute projects. I would say I am a Jill of many trades, and master of quite a few!

lender.name: Shahrooz
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do! micro-finance is the key to creating self-sufficient communities. kiva makes it so easy to find people and projects you're passionate about and to help support those individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated from UC Irvine and currently work as Executive Assistant to the Mayor of Irvine, California. I also work with The Africa Project - an Irvine based non-proft organization that works to provide South Africa AIDS orphans with basic necessities such as food, education, and health care.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand the good that a little help in the right place at the right time can do. I support the entrepreneurial spirit wherever it is found and I believe in its ability to make life a little better for us all.
lender.occupational_info: I make documentary films that are seen on television in the United States.

lender.name: Cyn
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make their way in the world.
lender.occupational_info: To make a difference in the world whatever way we can...that is what is most important.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I understand the desire to become an entrepreneur and want to assist others with making their dreams come true, and bettering their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a distributor for a health and wellness company - Waiora. I help people to improve their health, thus improving their lives.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you help if you can?

lender.name: courtenay
lender.loan_because: when I was a little girl, my family hit,hard times for a few years. Friends helped us get back on our feet l. I am a product of helping hands, and now I have more than enough. So I am passing it on to others with love and joy.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor and producer and also work with several non-profits in my spare time.

lender.name: DENISE
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great idea. You feel connected to the entrepreneur by making a direct loan as little as $25 to them. You can even use Paypal, so none of your financial information is given. Check out the You Tube video for additional information: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MXk4GUGXNTQ

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur who believes in making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites and get excited about social media. I also am trying to inspire more people to join www.KivaNewYork.com and support New York's efforts on Kiva.org!

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I love that other can benefit from my loan and I find that because of organizations like KIVA, the world can become a better place! I am very happy to have found out about KIVA
lender.occupational_info: I do administrative work for a telecommunication company in North America

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: that progress should always be defined on a global scale
lender.occupational_info: I study the evolution of galaxies that formed when the Universe was approximately 10% its current age.

lender.name: Thinkfree Media
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I admire ambition and hard work. I am thankful that I am in a position to help others improve their own businesses and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help sick children get the nutrition they need to heal and get better.

lender.name: Family Fisher
lender.loan_because: My family chose to get involved with micro financing to do something meaningful and helpful for others with money inherited from our parents.

lender.name: Edward and Ann
lender.loan_because: I continue to loan because I have seen the difference it makes in lives. I am serving as a Kiva Fellow. This work makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the world of investments and client management. My wife is a dentist who loves helping people.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: To set an example for my kids
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research that examines the socio-cultural impacts of tourism

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: The JOY of sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician. I've been a church, community and school music teacher.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I love people, and to show others that complete strangers are willing to help out.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Give what you have. To someone, it may be better than you dare to think. Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

lender.name: Valbona
lender.loan_because: I want to support small businesses and initiatives in other countries, especially where the people cannot afford to play the games of its system.

lender.name: IRENE
lender.loan_because: to help myself and family get back on our feet with finances. i have 3 children. we have VERYlimited income. Work full time. and some bills need to be paid, and more importantly to get my 2 kids back in school. If you can Help please ANYthing would be greatly appreciated towards my childrens education. 2 and 3 yr old.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others. i cant help financially at this point, but i am willing to do what it takes to get back on our feet, and i am a very CARING person.

lender.name: Mary Keating
lender.loan_because: I want to help women have better lives

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I want to see poverty erased around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting entrepreneuers and Creating financial freedom.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.occupational_info: Studying child clinical psychology.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: everything that I have is a gift from God and I am compelled to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I do social media for companies

lender.name: jing
lender.loan_because: I am currently a middle school teacher in a small city of China,i just passed the exam of getting a master degree in a university of shanghai,i need pay my tuition fee .so i need borrow 1000$.thanks.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time english teacher in a middle school ,work 8 hrs a day and have weekends and summer&winter holidays,i go to traning center to do parttime job in spare time to collect my master degree tuition fee.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I wish to invest in people who have not had the same opportunities as myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain an oil refinery

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping the poorest people of the world to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer in a 12 piece band called SoulZU. I also have just finished my university degree and I am trying to find work in an advertising agency...hopefully to do many creative things!

lender.name: Arif
lender.loan_because: Even a little bit goes a long way.

lender.name: Conni
lender.loan_because: By empowering women, we make the world stronger
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service, which protects the land and the animals that depend on it.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I develop online business EYEEARN.
lender.occupational_info: search in www.eyeearn.com

lender.name: Kathye
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to connect with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I recently stopped working in the Public Health field to stay home and raise my three young children.

lender.name: Adi Vardika
lender.loan_because: because I believe every single one of them deserve to be given a chance to live the life they have always wanted.

lender.name: Eva-Pernille Naserian
lender.loan_because: It is very important to share both love and money - no matter how little you might have yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelancewriter - specialising in webjournalism.

lender.name: thierry
lender.occupational_info: Artworks

lender.name: Meril
lender.loan_because: Let us complain less and give more

lender.name: Mihail
lender.loan_because: there are people in need
lender.occupational_info: writing computer software

lender.name: A- & B-Hoernchen
lender.loan_because: We are grateful for our life and want to help other people to reach also a better life.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I loan because if I don't my friends Mohan and Isa keep giving me a real hard time... :-)

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I can't do everything but I can do something.
lender.occupational_info: I make woven jewelry using ancient techniques from Eastern Europe and textile cultures.

lender.name: Sharin
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to feel good about themselves. It is a loan of love.
lender.occupational_info: I give of my gifts from God with no conditions attached, with love and my faith.

lender.name: Valentin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have a decent life

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: It is a direct way of making a difference.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: If we all do just a little bit it can make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, I tutor, and I know the benefits of great nutrition.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupation: Social Actions founder and project lead

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: my friend Suzanne introduced me to Kiva with a gift certificate on my birthday.

lender.name: Toph
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro lending.

lender.name: Vashti
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a helping hand, nit a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I run similar organisation to Kiva, based in the UK. However, we collect our loans in UK pounds and lend them in locally currency, so that the grassroots organisations we support do not have to worry about currency fluctuations.

lender.name: Gutelaunekatze
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a chance.
lender.occupational_info: i work as a consultant.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is a great commodity to share.
lender.occupational_info: I make oil paintings in a studio at my home and also work for a company in Denver that ships, stores and installs fine art.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Everybody must get a chance in this one world!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: To make a positive impact in the lives of people abroad.

lender.name: Anthea
lender.loan_because: from little things big things grow

lender.name: Ada
lender.loan_because: Because I like to help others.

lender.name: Noah Balmer
lender.occupational_info: I work on the Kiva Web site. I'm also starting an art, technology, and education oriented community workshop in San Francisco.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of everyone to create a better life for themselves and the people around them, but sometimes we all need a little help to get going.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a significant way. I want to see quality of life improve for people around the world. I want to be part of positive change.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the content on our website.

lender.name: Chloe
lender.loan_because: money that makes so little difference to us means the world to these entrepreneurs. I also like hearing their stories.

lender.name: Khoi
lender.loan_because:
I am so very bless to be able to Vượt Biên and now has the opportunities to assist.
Khôi rất hân hạnh được giới thiệu đến Kiva sau khi xem chương trình TV tên là Oprah cách đây vài năm. Khôi vừa mới đi Việt Nam mới về lại Canada. Đất nước Việt Nam yêu dấu còn nghèo nhưng con người Việt Nam nói chung là rất cần cù, dể tánh và hiếu khách. Bao nhiêu niềm thương non nước!
lender.occupational_info:
I work as a global help desk specialist, whom helps other people with their computer problems. I love to share, assist people so very much.
Khôi làm cho hảng của gốc Mỹ nhưng trụ sở tại Canada. Khôi rất thích đem lại lợi ích cho mọi người, trong hảng làm, hay là trong gia đình, hoặc bạn bè mến yêu.

lender.name: Pitopia
lender.loan_because: We are a amall enterprise and want to help other small enterprises to get on their feet and build up sth.
lender.occupational_info: We run a picture agency, where over 2000 fotografers act together to sell pictures.

lender.name: Liviu
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: Sitting at the computer, creating various programs used by telecom/finance/medical industries, and constantly reading new scientific articles/books to keep me up to date with latest technologies.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: as an American I have more than I need. I want to share some of that with people in other countries who need the resources.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities for others to create a self sustaining business and experience success and happiness in their and their family's life.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for over 18 years in the computer industry. Now I help others start up their own businesses and teach them general business concepts.

lender.name: Phill and Mo
lender.loan_because: our world needs to be a better place with hope and peace for everybody in it. We are all children of this world. So we need to help eachother.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Bryan and Helen
lender.loan_because: We want to provide opportunities to others.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a school leader in California.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others to live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the medical needs of animals.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: We are blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed as a Professional Engineer , registered in Alabama and California I do design and consulting in Micro Electro Mechanical systems (MEMS) Also , have made a prototype miniature transient data recorder with onboard accelerometer that I am working to start a business with

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed and appreciate the tremendous freedom of being in charge of my own income, and I want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I do writing for businesses that want to communicate better with their customers, employees and stockholders.

lender.name: becca
lender.loan_because: Twenty-five dollars can very far, especially when your able to loan the same twenty-five dollars to many people out.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: This is an experiment for me. I see this as an alternative way to donate to those less fortunate than I, and also as an interesting new investment opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Until recently I worked in the Telecommunications sector, but have left to persue a graduate degree. I'll also be doing some research work for the college (Boston University).

lender.name: Karen & Jean
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel fortunate and blessed with our lives and want to share and enable others to feel the same.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I am extremely passionate about community development and the abolishment of poverty worldwide.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: for less than the cost of a night out in the city with friends, I can actually help to better a person's life. As the quote goes: be the change you want to see...
lender.occupational_info: I love the culinary process-from farm to table-and consider myself lucky to be able to help others involved in that process around the world in this small way.

lender.name: Annelyse
lender.loan_because: Little by little, lending a helping hand can change the world
lender.occupational_info: teaching English and researching the impact of microcredit loans on education in Colombia

lender.name: Catalyst
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Catalyst Innovation Group is a financial services marketing innovation company.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I'm co-founder of a project that will connect art students with donors to create work about social issues.

lender.name: Penelope
lender.loan_because: The world is becoming a village; I want to be a part of my community.
lender.occupational_info: I sell books, music, and movies. I love to read then talk about books with my customers.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I can. I loan because I believe in giving people the chance to do for themselves. I loan because it's a chance for me to show my children that "giving" comes in many forms.
lender.occupational_info: As a learning professional I enable others to take control of their performance and through that their success. I believe that given the right tools and skills people can do great things. Kiva's goals and values support that belief...

lender.name: C.J.
lender.loan_because: I am learning how to share my gifts and allowances
lender.occupational_info: i am in 2nd grade

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about helping ambitious entrepreneurs become more self- sufficient. Every single one of us has the capacity to change the world.

lender.name: Rick & Ginger
lender.loan_because: It is a direct method of connecting with those who need help. We loan because Christ calls us to do so!

lender.name: Loretta
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to lend a hand to those who are trying to make a difference in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I monitor the natural gas measurement and flow through underground pipes as well as assist customers who are buying and selling the gas on the pipeline.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: By God's grace, I hope to give someone else the hope and opportunity that my family has been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in the space business doing projects for NASA and the Air Force.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: we get a good start in the west and having travelled and worked in developing countries it made me aware of just how different life is for those (majority) who don't have the same privledges. I acknowledged I have been blessed and wish to bless others in turn in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: Currently working back in the U.K.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I know where my money is going. I know who is getting it and what it is being used for. I can decide on a case-by-case basis if the request makes fundamental sense to me. All of my money goes directly to the person who needs it. I'm happy to sponsor Kiva as well. Basically, I get to chose where my money goes. And... it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture the microprocessors used in personal computers.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: it is the fulfillment of my faith ... and it is my way of passing my blessings forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large corporation, which allows me to pass on my blessings.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Rick & Rosemary
lender.loan_because: In memory of my husband, Rick Hundal, who believed everyone should have the ability to change their life.

lender.name: karen
lender.occupational_info: i cook, clean, and make up dances with 8 year olds. when i'm not doing that, i'm in college attempting to learn something

lender.name: Stanford SIGM 08
lender.loan_because: WE loan because we believe that even a single person can make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of 124 young people from more than 30 countries, who met while studying business together in America. We work in many different industries - from architecture to journalism to finance, and many others besides! - but we're united by our common desire to use our business skills to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Ebun Omoni
lender.loan_because:
of this quote: "Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime".
Kiva is essentially helping people around the world teach themselves how to fish.

lender.name: Lee-Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe those who do help themselves should be helped. I believe everyone should have the chance to get out of proverty.

lender.name: Adrik
lender.occupational_info: I am a film maker and internet entrepreneur.

lender.name: Tanner
lender.loan_because: there is no greater feeling than helping someone.

lender.name: Rowanne
lender.loan_because: people with goals and a vision may need only funds to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who realize their lack of education and exposure to the world of finance, budgets, and planning has kept them from achieving their financial goals.

lender.name: BTGNow.net
lender.occupational_info: BTGNow.net is a financial education site. Our goal is to offer free, high quality financial education resources to whomsoever seeks them by coming to the website!

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: to help someone off their feet and prosper thru micro loans
lender.occupational_info: Delivers mail 5 days a week and also provide housing by renting out apartments

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are trying hard to survive and live a better life.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Frederico
lender.loan_because: We should share our happiness, wealth and all the good things that we have in order to make the world a better place to live in and consequentely perpetuate our own well beingness, because we are all interconnected.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: weil ich bisher sehr viel Glück in meinem Leben hatte und etwas davon weitergeben möchte.
